answers.answer: I'm 26 weeks and I've gained 7 lbs so far. I'm having a little girl too :)
28 weeks and have gained only 2 pounds back of the 23 I lost in the beginning. I'm all baby.

I am 25 weeks and 2 days and in the beginning I lost 15 pounds, and I gained 15 pounds pack when I went to my appointment yesterday (Thursday) : /but doctor says that's good, but I do not see anywhere that my body has gained it back lol
I had my 38 week appt on thursday, and have gained 28. But I had lost 25 in the first trimester, so I've really only gained 3.
I am 19w2d and have gained 6 so far.
I'm 21 weeks + 5 days and as of my last appointment I hadn't gained any. I lost 7 lbs in the beginning, but def. got the baby bump.
I'm 33 weeks and 4 days, I've gained 35 pounds.  Doctor says it's normal cause I was considered a skinny mini prior to pregnancy as well as its all baby and water weight
I will be 34 weeks tomorrow and have gained 23 lbs!

question: I am 33+4 and at my appointment yesterday when I was weighed, I realized I have gained 22 lbs so far!  At my 30 week appointment my little girl weighed 3 lbs 4 oz :) dr says we're both perfect, especially considering I have gestational diabetes! :)
title: How much weight have you gained :)
